entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2025-03-26
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Test failure "microsoft.com sub-string not found" in Components.E2ETests.ServerRenderingTests.RedirectionTest.RedirectStreamingEnhancedGetToExternal #61175
  • Server-side Blazor Scoped injection is very unhelpful #61174
  • Perf regression: json #61172
  • Perf improvement: kestrel-hostheader-mismatch #61171
  • WebApplicationFactory<TEntryPoint> will not allow Middleware to be added via the ConfigureWebHost() method and maintain the existing functionality from the TEntryPoint. #61170
  • Dot Net 8+ NotFound behavior #61169
  • Make it possible to turn of OpenID Connect configuration retrieval, or enable removal of an added authentication handler #61168
  • SignalR.Client: Failed sending message, trying.. #61164
  • Perf regression: fortunes #61163

Closed

  • [Blazor] Blazor Web App with multiple secure API not working with OIDC #60868
  • Output caching not working on child action #57116
  • ASP.NET Core OpenAPI generator incorrectly duplicates schemas and creates invalid $ref for simple structure #60164
  • Perf regression: fortunes_dapper, json_middleware #61149

PullRequests

Created

  • Do not use Wix targets to sign intermediates #61173
    area-infrastructure
  • [Blazor] Generate Link headers based on StaticWebAssets manifest properties #61166
    area-blazor, 10.0-preview4

Merged

  • Update Chrome download link and disable TerminalLogger for Helix tests #61157
    area-infrastructure, 10.0-preview4

Updated

  • Update .NET SDK to 10.0.100-preview.4.25174.4 #61134
    area-infrastructure, Type: Dependency Update :arrow_up_small:
  • Harden handling for generic type arguments in source generator #61145
    area-mvc
  • Add `NotFoundPage` to `Router` #60970
    area-blazor, feature-blazor-routing, .NET 10 Planning
  • [Blazor] Use WriteImportMapToHtml=true in blazorwasm template #61036
    area-blazor, feature-blazor-wasm, 10.0-preview4
  • Add a new UseKestel API to the WebApplicationFactory #60635
    area-mvc

entry.title: dotnet/csharplang - Issues & Pull Requests - 2025-03-26
entry.content:
PullRequests

Merged

  • Extensions: mark open issues as resolved #9258
  • Use space as separator in ignored directives #9262

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2025-03-26
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • TPT: cascade from parent, trigger from child #35848
  • Exception message for type mismatches #35846

Closed

  • Creating a migration to rename many properties in a MSSQL table gets confused. #35850
  • Remove obsolete attributes at the start of EF10 #34467
    10.0.0
  • How to remove all childrens from AggregateRoot collection by one query #35847

PullRequests

Merged

  • Remove members obsoleted in EF 8 #35845
  • Don't publish macos and linux #35849

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2025-03-26
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • System.InvalidOperationException: InvalidOperation_ConcurrentOperationsNotSupported #28648
  • Re-use Cached Typeface for FontExtensions.ToTypeface() #28642
    Backlog
  • Re-enabled Android UITests #28640
    Backlog
  • "The given key 'Microsoft.Maui.Controls.SetterSpecificity' was not present in the dictionary" during Dynamic Style Assignment in MAUI ContentView #28635
    .NET 9 Servicing
  • [Android] SearchHandler Placeholder did not update when changed at runtime #28634
    Backlog
  • Clipping elements in MAUI leads to a degradation in scrolling performance. #28629
    Backlog
  • [SPEC] Allow global ResourceDictionary configuration in MauiProgram to resolve DI and StaticResource lifecycle issues #28628
    .NET 10.0-preview4
  • [Android] CollectionView Header and Footer Do Not Align with Horizontal ItemsLayout When EmptyView is Displayed #28622
    .NET 9 Servicing
  • [Windows] The ClearPlaceholderIcon is not displayed in the SearchHandler #28619
    Backlog
  • [Enhancement] Fullscreen property on WebAuthenticator #28618
    Backlog

Closed

  • SwipeItemView Image not showing on first Swipe from within VerticalStackLayout - BindableLayout.ItemTemplate #25235
    Backlog
  • SwipeItemView won't render FontImageSource on first opening #18806
    Backlog
  • Move Android UITests to run on Linux #28226
    .NET 9 SR7
  • [Windows] Constructor code not executed when setting control properties globally #28637
  • [Android] App crashes after adding a custom control #19953
    Backlog
  • SearchBar focus/unfocus do not fire on Windows #28419
    .NET 9 SR7
  • RadioButton formatted string with binding does not work correctly #28621
  • .Net Maui Blazor Hybrid has an issue with iOS Screen when you double click a button #22555
    Backlog
  • Try to navigation to any XML Page after click on button that's included into IFrame Control #24353
    Triaged
  • RecyclerView Handler doesn't work in release mode #28620
  • Slim Bindings "Module not found" errors #28616
  • Update WindowsAppSDK to 1.7 #28613
  • MAUI with "dotnet watch" hot reloading does not work for CSS changes #28134
  • Android native dialog accessibility #24749
    Backlog
  • [iOS] Notification Service Extension Not Working in TestFlight Release Build #24737
    Backlog

PullRequests

Created

  • Provisioning: Only install specific Android API levels if requested #28650
    t/housekeeping ♻︎
  • [NET10] Add global resources and configuration method #28649
    community ✨
  • [Testing] Fixed test case failure 28485 #28644
    area-testing, community ✨
  • [iOS] - Resolved Proper Rendering of Dynamic Header/Footer Updates in CV2 #28641
    platform/iOS 🍎, area-controls-collectionview, community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • Fixed Refresh Color not applying to RefreshView initially. #28638
    community ✨, area-controls-refreshview, partner/syncfusion
  • [Android] Fix for SearchHandler Placeholder did not update when changed at runtime #28636
    platform/android 🤖, area-controls-shell, community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • Fix up net10 TODOs in PropertyMapper #28630
    t/breaking 💥, t/housekeeping ♻︎, area-architecture, .NET 10.0-preview4
  • [Testing] - Fix for flaky UI tests ShouldIgnoreBottomContentInsetForCollectionViewItems and VerifyCarouselViewBindingAndRendering #28626
    area-testing, community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • [Test] Run Windows Device and UI Tests on 1ES pools #28625
    area-testing
  • [Catalyst] Fixed the CanMixGroups Set to False Still Allows Reordering Between Groups in CollectionView #28623
    platform/macOS 🍏, area-controls-collectionview, community ✨, partner/syncfusion
  • [Windows] Fix for Grouping collection view without data template results in displaying the default string representation of the object #28617
    platform/windows 🪟, area-controls-collectionview, community ✨, partner/syncfusion

Merged

  • [net10.0] Merge main to net10 #28647
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, .NET 10.0-preview3
  • SwipeItemView won't render FontImageSource on first opening - fix #25397
    platform/windows 🪟, platform/android 🤖, platform/iOS 🍎, community ✨, area-controls-swipeview, .NET 10.0-preview3
  • [Testing] Move Android UITests to run on Linux #28513
    area-testing
  • Investigating things for easier Aspire integration #24365
    t/breaking 💥, area-core-hosting, .NET 10.0-preview3
  • TextTransformUtilites -> TextTransformUtilities #28632
    t/breaking 💥, t/housekeeping ♻︎, area-architecture, .NET 10.0-preview3
  • [ci] Sign fonts with 3PartyScriptsSHA2 #28646
  • Fix Tizen method parameter name misspelling #28627
    t/breaking 💥, t/housekeeping ♻︎, area-fonts, platform/tizen, .NET 10.0-preview3
  • [.NET 10] Make DataFlowDirection enum public #28631
    t/breaking 💥, t/housekeeping ♻︎, .NET 10.0-preview3
  • [ci] Fixes for net10.0 arcade push #28639
  • [Testing] Migration of Compatibility.Core platform-specific unit tests into device tests - 2 #28058

  • [Housekeeping] Controls sample navigation crash - fix #28069

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2025-03-26
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • IAsyncEnumerable.DisposeAsync NotSupportedException Message #77850
  • C# editor breaking change in behavior when writing await keyword inside event handler #77848
  • Unexpected value 'Preprocessing' of type 'Microsoft.CodeAnalysis.SymbolKind' #77847
  • <I'm not 100% sure if this belongs here> On Linux the CodeAnalysis somehow produces a Null Value issue #77843
  • Undocumented / incorrect requirement for import directives to be alphabetically sorted to trigger IDE0055 #77831
  • C# compiler incorrectly generates arrays for `params` of an enumerable of a `ref struct` type #77827

Closed

  • .ToList() and .ToDictionary() always considered as apparent type by csharp_style_var_when_type_is_apparent #76260
  • Add code style rule for trailing commas in supported scenarios #76728
    Backlog
  • IDE0051 false positive, private members are shown as unused (light grey font color) #76857
  • C# compiler crashes with enumerator of 'ReadOnlySpan<T>' values method #77830

PullRequests

Created

  • Merge `features/extensions` into `main` #77851
    Area-Compilers, Feature - Extension Everything, untriaged, Needs API Review, VSCode
  • Make types sealed in IDE layer. #77849
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Needs UX Triage, VSCode
  • Another attempt to fix the SDK insertion issue related to runtime/apphost downloads #77845
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Properly classify modern extension methods #77841
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode
  • [release/dev17.12-telmet] Remove schedule from unsupported branch #77837
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Remove schedule from unsupported branch #77835
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Remove schedule from unsupported branch #77834
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Merged

  • Extensions: remove PROTOTYPE comments #77836
    Area-Compilers, Feature - Extension Everything, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'main' => 'release/dev17.15' #77839
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Nullable enable IDE. #77842
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Needs UX Triage, VSCode
  • Block use of extension properties in unsupported scenarios #77844
    Area-Compilers, Feature - Extension Everything, untriaged
  • Update Ubuntu and MacOS images #77833
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Next
  • Review call sites of extension methods related APIs #77838
    Area-Compilers, Feature - Extension Everything, untriaged
  • Extensions: compact error codes #77832
    Area-Compilers, Feature - Extension Everything, untriaged
  • Use patterns #77828
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode, Next
  • Extensions: Review/adjust call sites of MethodSymbol.IsExtensionMethod API #77820
    Area-Compilers, Feature - Extension Everything, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'main' => 'release/dev17.15' #77819
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Needs API Review, VSCode
  • Extensions: check inferrability #77815
    Area-Compilers, Feature - Extension Everything, untriaged
  • Merge latest bits from `main` branch to `features/extensions` #77826
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Needs API Review, VSCode
  • Set PackageProjectUrl #77824
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, Next
  • Dictionary expressions: support concrete target types that do not use `[CollectionBuilder]` #77477
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Feature - Dictionary Expressions
  • Remove unused resx values #77817
    Area-IDE, untriaged
  • Another attempt to move MiscellaneousFilesWorkspace to a bg thread #77768
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode

Updated

  • Make `Implement with Copilot` light up on member name #77769
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged, VSCode
  • Make GlobalOptionService initialization synchronous. #77823
    Area-IDE, untriaged, VSCode
  • Razor EA: load from ServiceHubCore #77720
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Parse ignored directives #77696
    Area-Compilers, untriaged, Needs API Review, Feature - Ignored Directives
  • Add build utils to simplify local package sharing #77822
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • WIP Merge EditorFeatures.WPF into EditorFeatures #77707
    Area-IDE, untriaged, Needs UX Triage, Needs API Review, VSCode
  • Ensure that newline is inserted after file scoped namespace declarations #77821
    Area-IDE, Community, untriaged, VSCode

entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2025-03-26
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Outbox S.S.Cryptography.PbeParameters #113952
    10.0.0
  • Stack overflow from static constructors taking locks on Native AOT #113949
    10.0.0
  • Cannot consume TrustedCertificatesDirectory from netfx app #113947
  • [Text.Json] Error: NoMetadataForTypeProperties, SourceGenerationContext #113946
  • FileSystemWatcher reports incorrect sequence of events on MacOS #113945
  • JIT: Assertion failed 'FitsIn(tree->TypeGet(), value)' during 'Assertion prop' #113940
    10.0.0
  • JIT: Wrong result with `ConditionalExtractAfterLastActiveElement` #113939
    10.0.0
  • [wasm coreclr] fix Illegal byte sequence errors #113928
    Future
  • Deserialization of a JsonNode with string value fails #113926
    Future
  • Trimming analyzer false negative for Type property #113922
    10.0.0
  • Stop considering COR_PRF_DISABLE_OPTIMIZATIONS an immutable Event Mask #113921
  • Disabling `IlcScanReflection` noticeably decreases the app size #113919
  • HttpClient.GetFromJsonAsync<T> does not handle 204 returned by ASP.NET Core #113941
  • MetadataAggregator.GetGenerationHandle returns incorrect results for Guid heap handles #113910
  • runtime-diagnostics pipeline follow up work #113909
    10.0.0

Closed

  • APX: Assertion failed: `IsApxExtendedEvexInstruction(id->idIns())` #113870
    10.0.0
  • [NativeAOT][iOS] App Hangs/Freezes with Static Virtual Properties in Interfaces on .NET 9 #113423
    9.0.x
  • JIT: Assertion failed 'bbTrueEdge->getSourceBlock() == this' during Optimize Bools #113923
    10.0.0
  • JIT: Assertion failed 'isGeneralRegister(reg2)' during 'Generate code' #113337
    10.0.0
  • HttpClient does not automatically follow https to http redirects #108588
    Future
  • `double.Parse` on MacOS doesn't raise `FormatException` the same as Windows and Linux #113917
  • IAsyncEnumerable LINQ and Async context #113567
  • [mono?] Cannot run host tests due to xunit version mismatch #60550
    Future
  • APX: Assertion failed 'size == info.compCompHnd->getClassSize(typeHnd)' #113869
    10.0.0
  • [iOS] System.Diagnostics.Debug.Assert causing app to crash #113874

PullRequests

Created

  • TypeMap API (Dynamic implementation) #113954
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, new-api-needs-documentation, 10.0.0
  • [cDAC] Change FrameIdentifiers to be contract literals #113953
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • Do not generate unconstructed EEType for arrays that have a template #113951
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Interpreter GC info stage 2: Generate empty GC info and add baseline implementation of EnumGcRefs #113948
    area-VM-coreclr, area-CodeGen-Interpreter-coreclr
  • Fix declared type of custom comparer for MaxBy and MinBy #113944
    area-System.Linq, breaking-change, new-api-needs-documentation, needs-breaking-change-doc-created, community-contribution
  • Enhance logging of stubs through the PerfMap on Linux #113943
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Increase `runtime-coreclr libraries-pgo` timeout #113942
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Fix CoreclrTestWrapperLib to be robust against exited processes #113937
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • RangeCheck: Don't create invalid ranges #113935
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • JIT: Accelerate long -> floating casts on x86 #113930

entry.title: dotnet/runtimelab - Issues & Pull Requests - 2025-03-26
entry.content:
Issues

Updated

  • [Swift language features] Improve Swift async by generating single Swift function #2950
  • [Swift projection tooling] Introduce better diagnostics and error handling #2973

PullRequests

Created

  • [Swift projection tooling] New logging mechanism using Microsoft.Extensions.Logging API #3058
    area-SwiftBindings

Merged

  • [RuntimeAsync] Turn off the assert and enable test scenario for struct method thunks #3054
    area-async
  • [RuntimeAsync] Recognizing new overloads of Await related to the ConfigureAwait pattern. #3051
    area-async

Updated

  • [Swift Bindings] Implement Swift native handle as `SafeHandle` #3052
    area-SwiftBindings

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2025-03-26
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • APICompat should compare against a framework if it finds an empty folder for that framework. #47925
  • Track the usage of the built-in SBOM generation via telemetry #47918
  • Hot reload extra slow for changes in Rider due to backup files with ~ suffix #47912
  • [dotnet-sdk-8.0.311] dotnet tool install command get access denied error if tools already installed #47906

Closed

  • PathUtilities misbehavior on linux #45631
  • Create documentation about trust boundaries of the .NET SDK and how to use it securely #45340
    10.0.1xx
  • "dotnet restore" fails if the project path contains a bracket #47832
  • publishing a web api (net 9) is not correct #45196
  • Very slow "dotnet restore" in 9.0.200 or higher version #47784
    Discussion
  • Verify DAC signing works in preview VMR branches #47842
  • Unable to find directory for jdk 11.0.24; please make sure the tool is installed on this image. #45834
  • Add a optional reason for the requires msbuild theory/fact attribute #44311
  • GlobalAnalyzerConfig broke with potential ordering change in .net 9 and no documentation tells you how to fix it #45150
  • SDK workloads installed by VS showing up in workload listing after installing the latest .NET 10 SDK build #47794
  • MAUI Templates are not visible in Visual Studio #45309

PullRequests

Created

  • Improves workaround for MacOS file watching quirks #47926
    untriaged, Area-AspNetCore
  • Update to the latest application insights #47924
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Move the attribute files into the correct folder #47923
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [StaticWebAssets] Fingerprint JS modules #47921
    untriaged, Area-AspNetCore
  • [SBRP Usage Report] Add target pack support and scan project.assets.json files for package downloads #47916
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Generate Link elements based on StaticWebAssets manifest properties #47915
    Area-AspNetCore, 10.0.1xx
  • [StaticWebAssets] Backport perf fixes #47913
    untriaged, Area-AspNetCore
  • Try to update queue to macOS 15 #47905
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • dotnet CLI: "Collection initialization can be simplified" #47886
    untriaged, Area-CLI

Merged

  • simplify CreateTempSubdirectory #45633
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [release/10.0.1xx-preview3] Do not include symbols nupkgs in PSB archive #47919
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Update breaking-change-guidelines.md #47797
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Update message for issues labeled as breaking-change #47812
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Update message for PRs labeled as breaking-change #47798
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Do not include symbols nupkgs in PSB archive #47887
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Create trust boundary doc Fixes #45340 #45666
    untriaged, Area-NetSDK
  • Consolidate redist output paths #47767
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • FSharp assets should have vertical visibility in BP2 #47914
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Enable TSA tools #47876
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [release/10.0.1xx-preview3] Fix missing files from rpm and deb packages #47911
    Servicing-approved, Area-Infrastructure
  • Fix missing files from rpm and deb packages #47910
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Fix nullability warning in WebScenarioTests.cs #47907
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/9.0.3xx' => 'main' #47882
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Adjust how we enable dac signing to get it working on VMR release branches #47875
    untriaged, Area-VMR
  • Remove nuget-client from non-SB VMR #47846
    untriaged, Area-VMR
  • dotnet CLI: Rename project and command sub-folders #47800
    Area-CLI

Updated

  • realpath in c# #45637
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Don't exclude *.app and *.dmg in .gitignore template #47867
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Improve Post-Build Signing Validation in the VMR #47744
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • `dotnet package list` command should restore first #47873
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Improve pruned package data loading and handling #46898
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Ignore generic type parameter names when matching #40359
    untriaged, Area-ApiCompat
  • Update .net10 p2 to p3 in the table #47724
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Process C# directives in file-based programs #47702
    untriaged, Area-run-file
  • [StaticWebAssets] Make all the properties in StaticWebAssetEndpoint lazy #47833
    untriaged, Area-AspNetCore
  • Try NetCore-Public-Test #47773
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Use Arcade's publishing logic to publish a given VMR vertical #47076
    untriaged, Area-VMR
  • Remove summary when failing, and double space #47872
    Area-dotnet test, untriaged
  • Simplify exit code logic for dotnet test (MTP) and consider no results correctly as "zero tests ran" #47874
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Use CDN Fixes #47503 #47712
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Move in-vertical manifest merging to new arcade package #47881
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Update to AwesomeAssertions #47611
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Include only PackageReferences included at runtime in deps.json #46218
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged, breaking-change, needs-breaking-change-doc-created
